gridsim.parallel.gui
Class ParallelVisualizer

Object
  Component
      Container
          Window
              Frame
                  JFrame
                      AbstractVisualizer
                          ParallelVisualizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualizer, ActionListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible, ListSelectionListener, RootPaneContainer, WindowConstants
public class ParallelVisualizer
extends AbstractVisualizer
implements ActionListener, ListSelectionListener

ParallelVisualizer is the class that represents the main window used by the visualisation tool. From this window it is possible to start the simulation, run it step by step or in slow motion.

NOTE: This visualisation tool should be used for debugging purposes only. It is useful if you want to evaluate a new allocation policy for example. A real experiment is not meant to have any visualisation features. This interface was initially created for another simulator called PajFit (http://pajfit.sourceforge.net/).

Since:
5.0
Author:
Marco A. S. Netto and Marcos Dias de Assuncao
See Also:
GridSim.startGridSimulation(boolean), Serialized Form
